name: dm-bonn-sumory-bears
description: Deutsches Museum Bonn version of the Summy Bears exhibit

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && rm -rf ./sumory-bears && degit github:IMAGINARY/sumory-bears#v1.1.0 --force sumory-bears && cp -R ./extras/ ./sumory-bears && cd ./sumory-bears && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r ./sumory-bears/dist ./dist
